issue.title: Typo?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.0.204

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

example.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries

### Add your comment and screenshots

Typo? 
Easilist > EasyList ?

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/7ffbf3367a32a6e2717e8e20b229b38d31070612/EnglishFilter/sections/antiadblock.txt#L421

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109770855/181397186-a640a1fa-dbc8-444a-ba6c-5ded029d6e59.png)

</details>

---

Typo 2


The rule seems to be wrong. has too many spaces

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/a65b13e20900c8c204c03d7eb9101b77209ca1c3/EnglishFilter/sections/foreign.txt#L4836

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109770855/181397224-de80b7c1-9610-4025-9c8a-715aeb7b56cd.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body:
> 動画を再生しようとしたら真っ暗になってその後は再生が不可能になってしまう。これは明らかな迷惑要素の広告以外の何者でもありません。

I guess you were talking about the black screen before the video. It's a fix for old iOS devices and there is no other way to solve it, but if you have iOS 15, enable `advanced blocking` and check the filter update - you should be shown YouTube without ads in Safari.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: yandex.by

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://yandex.by](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyandex.by) ### Comment Username: @angelokofficial > почему-то на яндексе в сафари не блокируется реклама. первый скриншот - гл страница яндекса, второй - яндекс картинки. смена фильтров не помогает. AdGuard DNS тоже не блокирует там рекламу. в сафари все разрешения для AdGuard даны, в настройках Safari все пункты для AdGuard также отмечены. реклама блокируется везде, но не на яндексе почему-то. > > пробовал также установить сторонний RU AdList https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/advblock.txt, но это также не помогло, хотя на ПК с расширением AdGuard никаких проблем. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/TmhR3Fo.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/UWe4q42.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v4.4.0(954) Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:

AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

issue.title: Typo?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.0.204

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

example.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries

### Add your comment and screenshots

Typo? 
Easilist > EasyList ?

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/7ffbf3367a32a6e2717e8e20b229b38d31070612/EnglishFilter/sections/antiadblock.txt#L421

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109770855/181397186-a640a1fa-dbc8-444a-ba6c-5ded029d6e59.png)

</details>

---

Typo 2


The rule seems to be wrong. has too many spaces

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/a65b13e20900c8c204c03d7eb9101b77209ca1c3/EnglishFilter/sections/foreign.txt#L4836

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109770855/181397224-de80b7c1-9610-4025-9c8a-715aeb7b56cd.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Если стоит iOS 15 и включена "продвинутая блокировка" в настройках AdGuard for iOS, проверьте обновление фильтров, не выходите из этого окна примерно одну минуту, затем проверьте сайт (возможно потребуется очистка данных браузера). Этот способ не всегда может работать. > потом в Хроме на Виндоус Исправлено, но основное решение будет в AdGuard Extra https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/341.
Screenshot: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33488229/181445632-b2316b4b-e796-4691-8b29-4459bbd42fdf.png)

comment.body:
@RT9nPrufovNeBudet
> И что значит в России она отключена?

Почитайте [сами](https://www.google.com/search?q=%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B0+%D0%B3%D1%83%D0%B3%D0%BB+%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BA%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%87%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0+%D0%B2+%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B8&ved=0ahUKEwjTl7SVgpv5AhUumYsKHQk7AkwQ4dUDCBk&uact=5&oq=%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B0+%D0%B3%D1%83%D0%B3%D0%BB+%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BA%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%87%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0+%D0%B2+%D0%A0%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B8&sclient=gws-wiz).

> Зачем мне тестовая страница я также не понял. Проблема только с Ютубом.

Чтобы проверить работу программы. Сделайте это как сказал [выше](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/125478#issuecomment-1196524007), а именно без сторонних скриптов, расширений и только с нашими фильтрами. В пользовательских правила есть правила для YouTube?
